detectors.description: NeuroToken (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c4/c45589ddae88e55d128ca2f18a73303c553170a3_NeuroToken.sol#198-225) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:token.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c4/c45589ddae88e55d128ca2f18a73303c553170a3_NeuroToken.sol#70-72)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c4/c45589ddae88e55d128ca2f18a73303c553170a3_NeuroToken.sol#16) lacks a zero-check on :
